sentences.en: ...Kurt Weill's Broadway opera with lyrics by Langston Hughes.
sentences.cn: …由兰斯顿·休斯作词的库尔特·韦尔的百老汇歌剧。

sentences.en: "Whoa, I'm goin" to Barbay-dos!' ran the jaunty lyrics of a 1970s hit song.
sentences.cn: “喔，我要去巴巴多斯!”一首20世纪70年代流行歌曲这样欢快地唱道。

sentences.en: Gershwin's lyrics would today probably be deemed politically incorrect.
sentences.cn: 格什温的歌词在今天很可能被视为政治上不正确。

sentences.en: He's written a few overtly political lyrics over the years.
sentences.cn: 他这些年写了几首政治色彩鲜明的抒情诗。

sentences.en: His face contorts as he screams out the lyrics.
sentences.cn: 当他吼出这些歌词的时候，脸都扭曲了。

sentences.en: His lyrics are as acerbic and poignant as they ever have been.
sentences.cn: 他的歌词一如既往的犀利辛辣。

sentences.en: I didn't really listen out for the lyrics.
I don't sing perfectly in tune, but I think I put more expression into my lyrics than a lot of other singers do.
sentences.cn: 我唱歌不是特别合拍，但我认为我唱得比其他很多歌手都更富感情。

sentences.en: It helps to know French and Creole if you want to understand some of the lyrics.
sentences.cn: 如果你想读懂一些抒情诗，学点法语和克里奥尔语是有帮助的。

sentences.en: music and lyrics by Rodgers and Hart
sentences.cn: 由罗杰斯和哈特作词作曲

sentences.en: Read the on-screen lyrics and sing along.
sentences.cn: 跟着屏幕上的歌词一起唱。

sentences.en: The book contains lyrics and guitar tablatures for over 100 songs.
sentences.cn: 这本书有100多首歌的歌词和吉他奏法谱。

sentences.en: The lyrics are banal and the rhymes clumsy.
sentences.cn: 歌词平淡老套，押韵生硬蹩脚。

sentences.en: The lyrics of the song are embarrassingly banal.
sentences.cn: 那首歌的歌词非常老套，令人难堪。

sentences.en: With most of Dylan's lyrics, however, there are other ways of interpreting the words.
sentences.cn: 但是，迪伦的大多数歌词都有其他的解读方式。

trans.tran_en: The lyrics of a song are its words
